text: Excellent shawarma .. We can from Pennsylvania to check out Montreal and we found this nice restaurant. The food quality is excellent and the prices are reasonable. Excellent middle eastern food for sure.

Great late night spot if you are around the Mont Royal/Saint Laurent intersection. The owner is a really nice guy who goes the extra distance to make sure every customer is happy. Great variety of salads and good prices for shawarmas.  Spécial trio is a good deal. The fries are very good.
Delicious. I had the chicken shawarma and it was fantastic. The staff were very friendly. I'll definitely be back.
I go hear often for lunch. Quick service and good food. Cannot beat the price for this area.

Good Taouk      If you are up in the plateau and are craving good shish taouk, fast, head to this place. Corner Mount-Royal and The Main     I like the  chicken shawarma wrap, with garlic, hummus and hot sauce, an order of there ridiculous roasted potatoes(smothered in garlic sauce) and of course, washed down with black cherry soda. They call it a 'trio" in Canada     This place also has a butt load of windows along the wall so it is a great place to people watch...if you're into that.  wakawaka

DÉGUEULASSE ! Clairement la viande et les légumes ne sont pas frais. Foutage de gueule total. La pire pita au poulet que je n'ai jamais eu de toute ma vie et pour un prix vraiment pas donné.  Je pense que clairement, ils essayent d'abuser les clients bourrés des boites de nuits environnantes et pensent que ça devrait passer de leur faire manger ces immondices.  De plus, un des "cuisiniers" complètement borderline a engueulé une jeune cliente devant moi comme du poisson pourri car elle aurait regardé l'autre "cuisinier" d'une manière qui lui déplaisait.   Incroyable.
